Description: Fragment of a whetstone used as a mould.
Curator's comments: May have been used for hammering gold foil into rosette decorations. Unprovenanced parallel in Bonn (Schmidt 1997, no. 36, C 588, pl.15). Schmidt, S. 1997. Katalog der Ptolemäischen und Kaiserzeitlichen objekte aus Ägypten im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn, Munich.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (TI.16)
